event.name: JUNIOR 25 – MIX TEAM
event.desc: The Team will consist of 3 members with at least ONE MALE and ONE FEMALE member. All Team members must be minimum 13 and maximum 15 years of age.
event.summary: CATEGORY IS OPEN ONLY FOR STUDENTS BETWEEN AGES 13 & 15 years

event.desc: The Team will consist of 3 MALE members. All Team members must be minimum 13 years and maximum 15 years of age.

event.name: JUNIOR 25 – ALL GIRLS
